==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=uc|rs=士09|style=ky|shin=壷}}

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|on=[[こ]] (ko)
|kun=[[つぼ]] (tsubo)
}}

===Etymology===
Cognate with {{m|ja|坪|tr=tsubo}}. Likely shares its origin with {{m|ja|粒|tr=tsubu}}, in expressing the idea of something round and bulging outward.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|つぼ}}

# [[container]] or depression:
## A [[pot]] or [[jar]]; a [[vessel]] or [[bottle]].
## A [[basin]], as at the base of a waterfall.
## A [[pressure point]] in [[acupressure]] or [[acupuncture]].
# The [[core]] or [[heart]] of an issue.

====Usage notes====
In acupuncture and acupressure contexts, this word is most often spelled either in [[hiragana]] as {{l|ja|つぼ}} or in [[katakana]] as {{l|ja|ツボ}}.
